message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $950000. This is a fantastic opportunity to get your hands on a product that's truly one-of-a-kind.

Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $950000 is a good starting point, but I'm looking to pay closer to $800000.  I'm very interested in this product, so let's see if we can find a price that works for both of us.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're looking to pay closer to $800000, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $875000. This is a great compromise that still reflects the value of this incredible product.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While $875000 is closer to what I'm aiming for, I'm still hoping to land around $825000.  This would be a fair price that allows both of us to walk away happy.  Let me know what you think.

I understand that you're still looking to negotiate, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $850000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a fair price for this incredible product.
